        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="70776" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="70776" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.38</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2580">2,580</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="423"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Haltane</b> by <b>Parfums de Marly</b> is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. <b>Haltane</b> was launched in 2021. Top notes are Clary Sage, Lavender and Bergamot; middle notes are Saffron and Praline; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Cedar. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Parfums de Marly Haltane is made exclusively for Harrods. Specially made for those who expected only the finest ingredients, Haltane is revealed on the skin with layers of traditional aromatic woods and freshness of herbal top notes, while the soft and rich accords of saffron and praline represent an ultra-modern spin on the theme of oud wood.</p>

<p>Top notes: bergamot, lavender, clary sage<br />
Heart: saffron, pralines<br />
Base: cedar, elder wood, oud</p>

<p>It is available as 125 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                         <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">146</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Not a smooth transition from opening to mid notes
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">170</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May not stand out or get compliments
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.55.jpg" style="width: 4.325rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Saffron-55.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Saffron</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99049106974986; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.198.jpg" style="width: 3.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Praline-198.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Praline</div></div></div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371111" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sv2002"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2173872.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sv2002" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173872">sv2002</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733359829" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wood, creamy, a tad animalic, and mildly sweet. This is one of the best designer oud fragrances in my opinion. Super easygoing and somewhat Christmas-like. At first, I immediately got the oud and was unsure, my nose was recovering from smelling Hayat by Xerjoff, but as I wore it more and more it became a luxurious blend of woods and praline. Additionally the sillage and scent trail it generates is simply sublime; gotten a lot of complements from family. Comparing it to Oud for Greatness, they are somewhat similar but Haltane is more spiced and creamy while OFG has more going on. Sorry Layton, but Haltane is the best PDM in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2371111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2371111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370954" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JJ2137"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JJ2137" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714">JJ2137</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733350383" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hard to believe there is no fir balsam in the notes. It's very noticeable, smells really similar to Imaginary Authors Cape Heartache + some oud and BR540 molecules. Super overrated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2370954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2370954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369182" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sgd11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sgd11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632">sgd11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733233105" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, but not too sweet woody Oud. One of the easiest true Ouds to wear. I like this better than OFG. When I wear this, I get a strong piney cedar smell almost like a Christmas tree. Super weird because the first few times I wore it I didnt get that, but now its all I can think of. Great juice overall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2369182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2369182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646030">Olcay_s</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 02:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>in my opinion the best pdm scent is quite sophisticated especially the praline note leaves its similar ofg a bit lower. haltane smells much better if you live in a mansion with servants this is your scent completely royal! the best oud scent that those who don't like oud can buy because it is quite soft. longevity and silage are very good.<br />
<br />
 if you are going to have 3 PDMs<br />
<br />
1)Haltane<br />
2) Layton Sexculusive <br />
3)percival<br />
<br />
 will save you the whole year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2365796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2365796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dont kill me but its OK. If you love OUD this is going to be too weak for you. If you hate OUD, you MIGHT enjoy this. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2362480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2362480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360538" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chayabassam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335950"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chayabassam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335950">Chayabassam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 03:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was at Dubai duty free taking my weekly flight back to work. As a perfume fanatic I tend to spend most of my<br />
Time in the duty free exploring scents. I passed by PDM and decided to try haltane on my wrist and continued my tour, went to the lounge then headed to my gate. By that time the perfume had dried down on my wrist and I just had to go back to duty free and buy haltane. I just couldnt stop smelling it on myself. This perfume is a king in the perfumes world, very unique and complex, very high quality and gets compliments like no tomorrow. Imagine yourself in a suit having a meeting with C-level executives and they are all wondering how good you smell. Haltane isnt hyped like other pdms but in my personal opinion this tops most of the PDM line. 10/10, a solid solid perfume, lasts for 10 hours easily, projects all over the room and smells very classy and elegant. Yes! Spend a bit of money on a niche fragrance than buying dupes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2360538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2360538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357719" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352062" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="username193183"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="username193183" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323919">username193183</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is really similar to oud for greatness by initio, but way better. It has a rich and smooth woody sweetness, from the saffron, oud and praline, without being cloying in the slightest. This scent lasts really long, but the very sad thing about it is that it is extremely easy to go nose blind to, and I don't know why.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2352062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2352062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350891" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ville I"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2235353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ville I" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350891ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350891" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235353">Ville I</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best offerings of PDM in my opinion, but still decided not to buy this one. This smells so much like opulence, high class and wealth to me that I dont think I could pull this off, being just a regular, casual guy. Its my wifes favorite of all the PDMs, my colleagues also voted this to be the best PDM after sampling and I do very much enjoy the scent, but it is just not me. Maybe after I get older, richer, more stylish and high-class I start wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2350891"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2350891#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348780" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348780" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ismellsomething"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1613442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ismellsomething" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Heritage-Eau-de-Parfum-25312.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25312.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heritage Eau de Parfum"title="Heritage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348780ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348780" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341811" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="onjelbercier"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725255.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="onjelbercier" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Meliora-18750.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18750.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Meliora"title="Meliora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725255">onjelbercier</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 04:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's like how Polo Green should ideally smell. My dad wears it, and it really works on him! I'm saving this fragrances in my "for my future husband" list. It is so good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2341811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2341811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miu frags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miu frags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250097">miu frags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i really wanted to love this and initio's oud for greatness but to my nose the oud reminds me of a waiting room at the dentist. makes my stomach turn...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2339838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2339838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333792" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-Neo-93090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93090.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness Neo"title="Oud for Greatness Neo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So funny story about this one; I got the sample for this along with my samples of Layton, Percival, and Pegasus. And I could have sworn I wore and reviewed this right around the same time as the others, but when I looked back through my reviews this one was nowhere to be found. To be honest, I don't even remember why I picked this sample; it's not a very talked about offering from Parfums De Marly compared to fragrances like Layton or Percival. In any case, it's time to review. Let's get into it;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
The opening is woody, warm spicy, and aromatic. The primary notes I get are oud, saffron, lavender, and clary sage. The strongest of the notes are the oud and saffron. The oud is bold and powerful, but not overly animalic or funky. To me, it closely resembles the type of oud note that's found in Initio's Oud for Greatness; woody, earthy, and a bit more challenging than typical designer oud accords, but not dirty or fecal. The saffron is warm and spicy with some leather nuance to it, nothing too out of the ordinary for this type of DNA. This is followed by the lavender and clary sage. The lavender is aromatic, floral, and just a touch spicy. Lastly, the clary sage has a similar accord to the lavender, but leans towards sweet rather than spicy like the lavender. The dry down is woody, sweet, and warm spicy. The primary notes I get are oud, saffron, praline, and clary sage. The strongest of the notes are still the oud and saffron. The oud is still woody and earthy like it was in the opening, but the "oudy" punch is more dialed back. The saffron still carries the same accord from the opening. This is followed by the praline and clary sage. The clary sage still has the same aromatic and slightly sweet nuance, while the praline has announced itself with a sugary sweet accord in the base. It's worth noting that further into the dry down I started getting a citrusy kick from the bergamot. It was strange as I was expecting that would have happened in the opening.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is nuclear and easily fills a room. Sillage matches that intensity with a dense and heavy scent trail. After a few hours the projection was still filling the room and the scent trail was still easily noticeable. At the 7-8 hour mark the projection was still going strong at around 4-6 feet, and the scent trail was still noticeable. The fragrance didn't become a skin scent until after the 12 hour mark.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a fall/winter fragrance most suitable for evening wear. This would work well for formal occasions and date nights, however I would not wear this casually or to the office. This is a special occasion fragrance.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like oud-centric fragrances like Oud for Greatness that walk that fine line between challenging and mass-appealing, this is a safe blind buy for you.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
To me, this is really PDM's take on Oud for Greatness. And between the two, I prefer Haltane. PDM's Haltane has the same scent DNA, but I find it smoother and more enjoyable. It has the same level of performance to compete with OFG as well, they both are beast mode fragrances. Compliment factor will be the same with them as well; anyone that would compliment OFG will compliment Haltane. What it comes down to is the mass-appeal; Haltane just has more of it. And that's on par with PDM, they know how to do that very well. It also helps that you can get 125ml of Haltane for the same price as 90ml of OFG. At the end of the day some people are going to have brand loyalty to one or the other; but for all the reasons listed above, my recommendation is Haltane. If you need a special occasion fragrance, this is a great place to start.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 9/10<br />
Sillage: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2333792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2333792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332948" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332948" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bastion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bastion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253286">Bastion</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 17:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only oud fragrance ill ever love</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324704" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mihais"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275160"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mihais" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); And the dry down actually. The lavender and the pralines make this a different fragrance, even though they are subtle. Would still be redundant to have both. <br />
<br />
Personally, I'd rather keep Oud for Greatness, even though Haltane is the more complex of the two.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2324704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2324704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's got a nice woody sweet scent. Definitely a unique fragrance and a good one! Last ALL day. When I apply it for the morning, I can still smell it when I head to bed. The price is the only con. Find it for cheap on aura fragrance or any discounter. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315122" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siempre777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siempre777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853448">Siempre777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 00:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just the best PDM, better than oud for greatness. Love the spicy, piney, sweet mature vibe from this. Smells like a fresh baked pecan pie placed on a pile of $100 bills in the middle of a pine forest. Some saffron sprinkled in there just to have that br540 appeal/dna which it definitely does but does not irritate the nose. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2315122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2315122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313756" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kathan1811"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2212099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kathan1811" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Asad-72821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Asad"title="Asad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2313756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2313756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2212099">kathan1811</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 18:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is criminally underrated. It smells like pure class. The notes are extremely rich and smells very unique and classy. They have not been shy with oud. You could smell the oud the entire time you have it on you but the oud note here is not at all animalic. The saffron and praline make it sweet and creamy and has blended to the absolute perfection. As it dries down these notes start getting backed by a very soft leathery note. This was my first perfume from PDM and I was an instant fan. It's niche and it smells niche. If you want to realize the difference between a designer and a niche fragrance, smelling this is going to solve it for you in a second.<br />
Its more for the cooler weather as it can get obnoxiously strong in the summer if you are in a closed setting like a car.<br />
Longevity is 8-10 hours easily. It relies more on the sillage than projection. Sillage lasts you a good 3-4 hours with a 2-3 foot projection.<br />
Reserve it for classy and a bit formal occasions. It is NOT A MASS APPEALING FRAGRANCE. Wear it around people who appreciate a good scent and value class.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2313756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2313756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299202" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShabbatKing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1735763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShabbatKing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299202ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299202" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735763">ShabbatKing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is definitely among my top 3 from Parfums de Marly. I loved it on the first sniff; it resonated with my personality right away. Like most fragrances featuring oud, its dark, deep, and complex. But what truly caught my attention was the clary sage, adding a soft, gentle nuance that perfectly balances the darkness. Im aware of the comparisons to Oud for Greatness, but to me, it doesnt matter. Each has its own distinct character, and both deserve a place in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2299202"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2299202#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295390" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jpgfroggy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250864.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jpgfroggy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250864">jpgfroggy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 01:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its nice. a fresh and good scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2295390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2295390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284635" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SimpleMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2218044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2218044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SimpleMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2218044">SimpleMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 09:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've yet to get my nose on this scent yet (I do have a decant on the way which is why I'm in this comment section) but by God if I'm not compelled to go buy a bottle of it right now after reading the review below me @Zongo this man has a way with words and if your mindlessly browsing this site as I have often found myself doing and looking for some amusement go read some of his other reviews you wont be disappointed I promise.<br />
<br />
Anyways I'll leave my review once it arrives and I've spent some time with it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2284635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2284635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zongo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zongo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457">Zongo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gather 'round, you vapid vapor-snorting vermin! Ever wonder what it smells like when French aristocracy decides to get down and dirty with Middle Eastern royalty? Well, strap in and prepare your nostrils for Parfums de Marly's Haltane, a scent that'll make you feel like you're snorting crushed diamonds off a Persian prince's dagger.<br />
<br />
This isn't some run-of-the-mill juice for cubicle-dwelling drones and weekend warriors. No, this is olfactory sorcery, a fragrance that comes at you like a powdered-wig wearing nobleman on a three-day absinthe bender. It kicks off with a blast of herbal freshness that'll clear your sinuses faster than a line of gunpowder at a revolutionary's tea party.<br />
<br />
But don't get too comfortable, you mall-scent marinated simpletons. Because just when you think you've got this scent pegged, it pulls a Jekyll and Hyde routine that'd make Robert Louis Stevenson reach for his smelling salts. That initial burst of civility? It's just a smokescreen, a bit of perfumed legerdemain to lull you into a false sense of security.<br />
<br />
As it settles, Haltane transforms like a werewolf under a full moon, morphing into a leathery, woody concoction that'll have you questioning your sanity and your place in the food chain. It's the kind of scent that makes you wonder if those 18th-century French perfumers weren't cooking up more than just fragrances in their gilded laboratories.<br />
<br />
Now, I know what you're thinking, you whippersnappers with your "Oud for Greatness" and your synthetic space-age potions. But let me tell you something - Haltane is to Oud for Greatness what a vintage Chateau Lafite is to bathtub gin. It's got all the gravitas without the headache, all the punch without the synthetic hangover. It's like comparing a symphony orchestra to a kazoo band on meth.<br />
<br />
The longevity? It'll outlast your last three relationships combined. The sillage? It leaves a trail so intoxicating, you'll have people following you like you're the Pied Piper of Hamelin, if the Pied Piper smelled like a million bucks and a long night in a Moroccan spice market.<br />
<br />
Is it for everyone? Hell no. This is a scent for the bold, the brave, the slightly unhinged. It's for men who aren't afraid to smell like they've been arm-wrestling with history in the perfumed halls of Versailles.<br />
<br />
So go ahead, take the plunge. Douse yourself in this elixir and prepare for an aromatic journey that'll have you seeing sounds and tasting colors. Because in this bland world of cookie-cutter colognes and play-it-safe scents, Haltane stands tall as a beacon of olfactory rebellion.<br />
<br />
Haltane isn't just a fragrance, it's a time machine in a bottle, a portal to a world where decadence wasn't just encouraged, it was mandatory. And in this cruel circus of mediocrity we call modern life, it's the aromatic equivalent of a full-contact exorcism for your nostrils.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2282972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2282972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282864" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 14:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Testing this side by side to Oud for Greatness, I would say theyre 90% the same, I think Haltane has more of an oud emphasis personally and OfG has more saffron and lavender which makes it have more sweeter surprisingly almost grape smelling but by barely really. What is significant is performance, even though I feel Haltane is better and more cleaner smelling, OfG is louder and longer lasting I can get 10-12 hours easily while unfortunately Haltane is definitely weaker becoming a skin scent in like an hour and staying as a skin scent for for about 3-4 kinda like Oud Wood. Hard to really hate this dna definitely a mass appealing clean oud didnt ever really get any maltol sweetness that I was expecting but stands just outside of a love for me to feel like getting it in some capacity, still need to check out Oud for Glory</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2282864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2282864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281566" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liebesnacht"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2130235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liebesnacht" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281566ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281566" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2130235">Liebesnacht</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dear @camaleon22,<br />
<br />
I feel your pain and thank you very much for your extensive field search and review. I have exactly the same issue with Haltane as you do. Since I do not have the financial means to buy bottles and risk not being able to sell them again, I decided that I test samples from PdM. I also tested Haltane in the airport. I have gotten almost same results as you did. Pegasus performed monstrously, Layton and Carlisle okay and most frustratingly Haltane the worst (with the exception of Herod which didnt perform at all - strange).<br />
<br />
Initio's Oud for Greatness Neo is almost identical to Haltane, and Nishane's Papilefiko, albeit not as much as Neo, reminds me of Haltane too. I might give Detour Eco a try, as I am told the dry down is very similiar. Perfume Parlour might be a long shot too.<br />
<br />
All in all this is the first time I commented on Fragnatica, as your story reflected mine. I hope you enjoy Oud for Greatness and maybe give Neo a try. I think we have similiar skin chemistry and Neo performed slightly better for me. Yet it is more expensive.<br />
<br />
Good luck friend and have a good day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2281566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2281566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281557" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maxmiller614"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maxmiller614" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051">Maxmiller614</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yeah this is gorgeous. You get a cleannnnn oud right out of the gate, clean like Oud Wood clean. Mixed in with some fresh airy aromatic swagger.<br />
<br />
The projection on this isn't massive but to be honest that's a good thing for an Oud frag. Most Oud frags are enormous in sillage and projection so this being a little tamer makes this an extremely wearable oud.<br />
<br />
Now where this wins is the heavenly, heavenly dry down. It's a beautiful lavender forward drydown, blended with woodyness and a very subtle, soft sweetness.<br />
<br />
This is a top frag and worthy of it's praise. Works in every season but summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2281557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2281557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279168" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aram0000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aram0000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zaharoff/Signature-Royale-61901.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61901.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature Royale"title="Signature Royale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962748">Aram0000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 09:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's has little bit strong for me, but it's really, really sexy scent. Good quality. I like it but it's not what I want to smell every day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2279168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2279168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277696" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Soultrap"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350138"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1350138.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Soultrap" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350138">Soultrap</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 01:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just bought 2023 batch tester bottle of 125ml Haltane (batch code 3473258A) for 160$. <br />
<br />
This is my 3rd PDM bottle in the last 2 years and in the last 4 years I have tested almost their entire line. Perfect longevity and sillage here, I think there is absolutely no difference from the very first batch! It's not as sharp as OFG, to me it's sweeter, more balanced (less mossy) and masculine version of the OFG. If you buy from the discounters, PDMs are perfect quality fragrances for the price. <br />
<br />
So I really want to slap in the face those guys here who spread reformulation speculations. Maybe it can fix their broken olfactory receptors))<br />
<br />
My score: 8.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2277696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2277696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274541" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Demani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Demani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); Pine, woods, and amber with predominant oud note<br />

Blended together nicely with chocolate praline note<br />
Reminds me of Oud for greatness but less of a powerhouse and more gourmand</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2274541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2274541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
