Usually I dont like Oud fragrances but this is nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2265169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2265169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jackawad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2227701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jackawad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Absolutely-64501.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64501.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Absolutely"title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Absolutely"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2227701">jackawad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 19:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought a bottle of this stuff earlier this year, and it's hands down my favourite fragrance EVER. I originally received a 1.5ml sample of Haltane for my birthday and I went through that vial in less than a week. This fragrance opens up with a dangerously seductive spice and dries down to become more sweet and woody. It's an amazing, really masculine fragrance that I recommend to anyone who can appreciate a high-quality, finer blend of spice, wood and incense. My only complaints would be that it does smell similar to Initio's Oud For Greatness and it definitely does break the bank. However, if you do intend on spending over $500 AUD on a fragrance, let it be this. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2260979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2260979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260601" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreakyBob57"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231983"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2231983.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreakyBob57" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231983">FreakyBob57</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 10:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is probably one of my favourite niche fragrances hands down, This is a very complex fragrance of which Sprecher one clear goal: elegance. This fragrance perfectly combines the bitter oud accord and sweet praline, with a dash of saffron and bergamot for extra zing. This can be worn for lots of different occasions, but does best in the fall/winter for special occasions. Some may consider this "skanky", which i slightly agree with, but I prefer this over OFG a million times over. Haltane will definitely be my next pickup, heavily recommended from Parfums de Marly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2260601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2260601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791998">Kasra_mahjoub</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 00:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First sniff for this scent wasn't my taste.. but my girl loved it at the same second<br />
Oud is not quite strong as (INITIO OFG)<br />
I think The bergamot makes Praline a little crispy at the opening and as a Iranian of course I love the saffron note in this one ..<br />
Overall it's a safe compliment getter with a good quality and performance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2254866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2254866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is a wintertime, nighttime, and springtime fragrance. It is so full of aromatic and attractive aoud, far more complex than Initios Oud for Greatness. Not glazing, my dad got me this, and I will always have a full bottle of this. 100/10 Best mens fragrance ever!!!!!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2253484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2253484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My for this stuff is , and far greater than Initio OFG! My bottle is a 2023 batch, and the performance is great. I got 7 hrs early on skin, with moderate projection. Of course it lasts even longer on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2250820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2250820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jayzilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jayzilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202765">Jayzilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 08:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hands down my favorite opening of a fragrance ever. It has this cotton candy saffron note similar to BR540 but its balanced and does not smell juvenile at all (slightly spicy, aromatic and fresh). My only issue is that the dry down to me smells like a damp wood, kind of like a moldy log. I don't actually mind certain ouds but I do not find the dry down in this super pleasing. That being said, I think the dry down smells a lot better in the air than close up on skin. I prefer this to oud for greatness as its lighter and more mass appealing and outside of OFG, I think it is a very unique scent. My only issue is that I have Layton and while they are very different fragrances, to me they are for the same situations and it would be a headache to have to choose between them haha.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It took a few weeks to grow on me, but eventually, it resonated with me.<br />
<br />

<br />

The praline and saffron hit for me right away in the opening. Then the lavender and sage come into play while the saffron stays in the background . A scent done right . Pretty bottle color . Nothing about this fragrance makes it particularly stand out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2231206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2231206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2053172">Trevor44454444</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>That dry down is so good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2230125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2230125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zekersr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2189936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zekersr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189936">Zekersr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best PDM in my opinion. Best for fall &amp; winter, but quite hard to wear. Not an everyday if thats what youre looking for. Best for a bit more of a formal event or a cold weather date. Lasts long, projects great. Woody, oud, slightly fresh. I pick this up over any other oud fragrance. Wood scent with class, perfect imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2230098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2230098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222295" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lgwilso81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2197875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lgwilso81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222295ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222295" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2197875">lgwilso81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy the scent very much but for the price, the longevity is horrible.  Seems like it used to be a beast and has been diluted. Shame when houses blow a good reputation to make more money but that is business I suppose.  I got much better performance from OFG so I would highly recommend that until Initio starts diluting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2222295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2222295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219652" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshLiving"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1043744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshLiving" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744">FreshLiving</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my bottle. Smells amazing, and my earlier review still applies.<br />
<br />
However, the performance on this bottle is not what I thought it would be based off of my 1ml sample. As that was quite potent even though I was only using a couple of swipes with the plastic applicator. <br />
<br />
With this bottle, I sprayed once on my arm, and within 1 hour is was a skin scent. So I sprayed two more times, and again within an hour the experience is quite intimate. <br />
<br />
Not sure if my bottle needs to get some air in it to to give it more oomph but Ill test again when fall arrives. Heres to hoping.<br />
<br />
Seems like PdM fragrances are getting weaker all around though from what Im reading around the internet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2219652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2219652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219301" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dreamwithinadream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1602875.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dreamwithinadream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219301ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219301" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602875">dreamwithinadream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 11:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not a fan of Oud but the sales rep at PDM London persuaded me that Haltane was Oud light. I think this is correct - it is an imagining of Oud, deconstructed for Western tastes. When I tried it 2 years ago, I was impressed by its strength; the clary sage and praline hit hard and stayed around to the end. There is this vintage quality to it that many have commented on and bear with me - it is a cheesy toast facet from the oud note that conjures images of old hotels, nursing homes and specifically in my case, cafes from Brighton/Margate peer. This sounds awful but actually it works, providing a 70s staunchness to this otherwise diet oud fragrance. <br />
<br />
But, and its a big but, Haltane has been massively diluted. I tried it recently and gone was the initial pop with it becoming a skin scent in 3 hours. PDM almost had me converted to Oud! I have tried Oud For Greatness and I will say that following the dilution, it is the better fragrance. albeit on a much more linear and saffron driven ride.<br />
<br />
What a shame; oh how we are forced into a 'mid' acceptance of life's pleasures.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2219301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2219301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bread6602"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2148915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bread6602" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148915">Bread6602</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 22:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>PDM Haltane is truly a masterpiece of a fragrance. This scent is a very sweet and masculine oud fragrance. To me, the scent smells like a Egyptian prince. The oud, saffron, and prailine create a godly scent that invokes middle eastern charisma. <br />
<br />
This fragrance has very good longevity and projection. It would last forever on clothes if you never washed them. This is my go to winter scent has it fills a room. <br />
<br />
Longevity: 10/10<br />
Projection: 10/10<br />
Smell: 10/10<br />
Price: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2218023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2218023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216851" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IronRelative"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1670625.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IronRelative" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-L-Absolu-Platine-83296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre L'Absolu Platine"title="Libre L'Absolu Platine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670625">IronRelative</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 15:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample to test and it was really hard to dial the right amount, It was barely there or just too much, got a headache one time when I applied too much at night. <br />
Probably wouldnt use it indoors in a small space or in a car with many people, best suited for large indoor spaces when you dress appropriately. Cant justify the purchase honestly, I wish I could but I wont pay for something that made me sick if oversprayed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2216851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2216851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However, performance after reformulation is awful. Skin scent within the hour and gone after about 3-4. OFG is way better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2215605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2215605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214584" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stinkynuts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1996446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stinkynuts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996446">Stinkynuts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very easy to overspray, i first got a tester and loved it, but when i got a big bottle and blasted myself with six squirts and was choked out with a saffron/lavender baby powder vibe that isnt very pleasant... I generally like to spray heavy, usually 7-10+ sprays of most frags, but not this one! its a whole different fragrance depending on how much you spray. very masculine, oud, musky, leathery, praline when sprayed light, and gets very femenine, floral and powdery when heavily applied. still a fav....<br />
<br />
Edit<br />
Ok now I learned I can actually spray more sprays, just spread it out... too much in one spot changes the scent, just spread it out... love love love this scent!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2214584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2214584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214150" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214150" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yalcin05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yalcin05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-Parfum-89988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood Parfum"title="Oud Wood Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214150ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214150" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251">Yalcin05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A simple review: mix oud for greatness with oud for happiness.. but put more of greatness during the opening and mid.. and happiness in the drydown.. there you have haltane.. but with less performance. I said it before the oud is definitely not difficult so dont worry, it cones more as a sandalwood and cedar mix but that could be me..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206686" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gofast._.Ryan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gofast._.Ryan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); smell-10<br />
projectyion-9<br />
longevity-9</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2206686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2206686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203812" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stinkynuts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1996446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stinkynuts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996446">Stinkynuts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>just bought a big bottle of this after getting the PDM mens test set and this is the one that really really stood out and i already have a big bottle of Herod. this reminds me of my father and the Rugby pitch... has a sort of liniment or vintage first aid kit kinda smell to it... the aromatic, leathery, saffron, sage and oud is absolutely intoxicating and time travels me back to childhood memories.. i think this is my new signature frag</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2203812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2203812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203392" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasKiew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasKiew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/Historic-Olmeda-75670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Historic Olmeda"title="Historic Olmeda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203392ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203392" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442">JasKiew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 18:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haramain Detour Eco Al Haramain vs Haltane Parfums de Marly<br />
<br />
From the presentation and bottle, most can guess Detour Eco is a direct dupe for Haltane and it is. It costs about 10% and lesser of the cost of the Haltane. By the way the new Detour bottles have some improvements on sprayer compared to the og Detour Noir when it first came out.<br />
<br />
Here I am with my decant of Haltane and doing the last of the review for Detour Eco, the last of the 3 new Detour releases.<br />
<br />
Detour Eco opens up really nice and freshie, it's bergamot and lavender are more pronounced and the praline giving the sweetness is also louder. The saffron and oud sits behind giving the support and doesn't really stands out. THIS is the main difference in direct comparison with Haltane. Haltane is better quality and more well blended on the overall notes, you can get the oud and patchouli leather and the bergamot/lavender blends in better and isn't as pronounced as in the Eco, also it's less sweet than the Eco.<br />
<br />
However, I will say Detour Eco is the best of the 3 new Detour. Smells the best and close enough to about 80-90% other than the above differences. Detour Noir Intense is the worse with the strong tiger balm smell. Detour Exclusif Noir has longevity but smells weaker because the og is really loud.<br />
<br />
If you are looking to smell similar to Haltane, it's safe to blind buy Detour Eco But if you area fan of Oud for Greatness, it isn't close at all. Haltane is just an easier wear for OFG but there's still differences and Detour Eco has even more since it's a like a fresher version of Haltane. But Detour Eco is good enough and close enough since there are no other decently well known brands copying Haltane. All you need is give it 30 minutes or so and both smells so similar as the more pronounced bergamot and lavender in Detour Eco starts to sit back.<br />
<br />
I'll gladly give it a 9/10 for copying Haltane. Really value for money as I got my tester for $35 Singapore dollars. One of the best dupes I've tested recently vs the og.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2203392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2203392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202226" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DaveJC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2127550.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DaveJC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Infrared-66514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Infrared"title="Spicebomb Infrared"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127550">DaveJC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely amazing, one of the best PDMs out there, oud usually doesnt sit right with me, but this one was just amazing, gorgeous scent, reminds me of christmas, piney, heavy on the woody tree spice, a bit of mint(?) even, and slight chocolately scent, the opening of this fragrance screams the pricetag, you get what you pay for. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2198640"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2198640#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198434" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshLiving"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1043744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshLiving" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198434ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198434" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744">FreshLiving</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So recently I decided to order a 1ml sample of all 18 of PdMs mens current fragrances with a recently discontinued Shagya on the way.<br />
I have many things to say and will review each one in the coming weeks. <br />
<br />
Haltane from application to finish that was an unequivocally YES. This is a buy! <br />
<br />
Its seductive, sexy, masculine, bold, wearable, mature, incredibly smooth, warmly spicy, comforting, leathery, uplifting, calming. <br />
The lavender and bergamot play so well with the cedar and oud, while the praline note seduces you like youre about to be served dessert. <br />
<br />
Simply a beautiful scent. Magnificent. Shot straight to my Top 5 scents of all time. <br />
<br />
Usually Oud can be quite difficult for me as I generally find them suffocating or it will induce feelings of nausea, since its so potent. So to find a fragrance that balances a freshness to it as well as this, is wonderful. <br />
<br />
Its like a fougere and oud genius came together and made this scent. <br />
<br />
Highly recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2198434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2198434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
