padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187192" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mahdi ellahi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2088694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mahdi ellahi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088694">Mahdi ellahi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the only thing i really like about this fragrance is its woody/spicy base but unfortunately the base got annihilated by that disgusting fake saffron and burned sugar sweet note i experience with br540 . if you like br540 dna you will love this, if you don't then stay away basically both are using the same nose blinding chemical sweet note to my nose and i don't like it at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2187192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2187192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2183679" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ndabeat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2124212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ndabeat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2183679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2183679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124212">ndabeat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 06:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haltane by Parfums de Marly has become my absolute favorite fragrance from this house. Despite not usually being a fan of Oud perfumes, this one truly captivated me. It works exceptionally well with my skin chemistry, delivering a beautifully balanced and sophisticated scent. While some compare it to Initio's Oud for Greatness, I personally find Haltane to be superior in every way, with impressive longevity and projection. Its a masterpiece that stands out in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2183679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2183679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177182" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jasontallwood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1111570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jasontallwood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1111570">jasontallwood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 19:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an easier to wear version of Initio - Oud For Greatness / Lattafa - Oud For Glory. Immediately when I smelled my free sample I got with an online order I knew exactly what they were going for without coming on here. Seeing how Initio and Parfums De Marley are owned by the same company this wasn't a surprise. This reminded me of Parfums De Marley - Herod versus Initio - Narcotic Delight. However those two are far less similar. <br />
<br />
It's softer and there's some differences where it's not just "OFG" in a different bottle. <br />
<br />
If you've never smelled Oud For Greatness or one of the many accurate imitations chances are you'll like it. It's not that typical spicy woody mens fragrance, it's not one of the countless blue fragrances or aventus copies and don't worry it's not a filthy barn yard, body odor or a strong burnt paper scent with the amount of oud used either. No this one is wearable. I've shown tons of people from people who collect fragrances to neighbors who just wanted to get their sons a birthday gift and people all seem to like the way Oud For Greatness smells. <br />
<br />
scent rating - 4 / 5 <br />
age - any<br />
gender - any <br />
times to wear it - cool weather and night time, date night in particular <br />
Would I buy a full bottle? Not in a million years. I'm happy with my Lattafa - Oud For Glory and if I had enough for either I'd get Oud For Glory for about $28 and then paint the town red with a friend or date.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2177182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2177182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176771" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzanne_ronald"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478553.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzanne_ronald" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Pumpkin-Pie-13995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pumpkin Pie"title="Pumpkin Pie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553">suzanne_ronald</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth &amp; Refined Oud...<br />
<br />
 This is a nice, sweet oud, leaning masculine in the opening but transitions to a praline-oud and then something in the family of Baccarat Rouge 540.  I just have a sample of this, but I have no issue with the performance.  If you're looking for a beast mode scent, then get a UAE dupe, but this is an oud that could work for beginners or more sensitive noses, as it's not harsh or screechy, but feather-y smooth being dovetailed with lavender.   Beautifully blended, but won't be super original for those who are fragrance literate.  It's a love for me, 9/10.  Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2176771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2176771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175208" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shgreenejr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1952588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shgreenejr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175208ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175208" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952588">shgreenejr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 22:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY HALTANE!<br />
<br />
I will make this quick. Do not trust anyone that says Haltane is a better version of Initio's Oud for Greatness. If you spray both of them on you at the same time, it's almost impossible to say Haltane is superior.  Its been 3 hours since I sprayed both of these on each arm and if you do the same, here is what you will find:<br />
<br />
1.) Haltane lasts about 3-4 hours max.  It is a skin scent after about 2-3 hours. Its actually pretty remarkable how fast it dissipates. The scent is actually good, but it doesn't make any sense how fast it goes away, especially for the price.  If you are familiar with Tom Ford Oud Wood and it's lack of longevity, you will be in the ballpark of how atrocious this is. No one will dispute how long Oud for Greatness lasts.  At least 12 hours and sometimes, literally 18-24 hours before you can't smell anything again.<br />
<br />
2.) Haltane is not as well blended or smooth as Oud for Greatness.  DO NOT trust anyone that says Haltane is a more wearable version of Oud for Greatness.  It doesn't logically even make sense.  Look at their notes.  Haltane has to work much harder to create a better blend.  Haltane is a much more dirtier and earthier version of Oud for Greatness.  I have never ever not received a compliment wearing OFG.  Before I even get to my event, Haltane is a skin scent.  And its much more of an acquired taste.  TF Oud Wood is a better Oud scent than this.  Don't get me wrong, Haltane smells good, but it's just not quite there yet.<br />
<br />
3.) Haltane lasts about 3-4 hours max. Lol. For real though. I am smelling my wrist again, and Jesus, the scent is almost gone. Unbelievable<br />
<br />
If you want a 10/10 fragrance, please go and buy Oud for Greatness.  Who cares about the price.  Spray a couple times on your neck, a couple times on your arms, and one on your chest, and if you are around human beings with a nose, you will get someone to do a double take or ask you what you have on, guaranteed (if you look approachable lol).<br />
<br />
Haltane is good.  There are just better scents out there.  If it lasted just as long as OFG, it could have been a contender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2175208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2175208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172364" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172364" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Om3r_perfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2140989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Om3r_perfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172364ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172364" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989">Om3r_perfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haltane is my most recent purchase, and in a matter of a week I started gravitating and loving this scent quickly. It starts of with a bergamot smell then quickly dries down to an extremely spicy and saffron smell with a good base of oud and a woody note. I love how different this scent smells to everything else which is in the mainline of the fragrance industry. Its a great formal and office wear, yet still can be played off in more casual settings. Its a great winter and fall scent and perfect for the night times aswell. Honestly I think this is a top 3 de Marley fragrance behind Oajan and Altair. Haltane manages to be one of the best and most unique spicy woody and oudy fragrances out there. it projects a good amount and its longevity is up to 14 hours from my experience. Its definitely a very unique yet likable fragrance out there and I do recommend to get this cause you can easily fall in love with this scent. Although it does come at a very high price, more expensive than the other De Marleys as its formally a Herod exclusive. <br />
<br />
Scent: 10<br />
Projection: 8<br />
Longevity: 10<br />
Value: 7<br />
Overall: 9.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2172364"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2172364#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170701" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheTrackEnthusiast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2054081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheTrackEnthusiast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054081">TheTrackEnthusiast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 16:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>That oud opening is not nearly as nice as most of the PDM scents but this dries down to a heavenly warm and sweet tobacco scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2170701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2170701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168502" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ejgossett"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094524"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2094524.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ejgossett" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-Cedar-64560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti Cedar"title="Halfeti Cedar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168502ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168502" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094524">ejgossett</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh Haltane, you are an exquisite example of how playful and light Oud can be, even in its synthetic form.<br />
The bright bergamot, the clary sage and lavender florals, the praline sweetness, the spicy saffron, all wrapped up in a warm and woody Oud and Elderwood... Every note is defined, yet nuanced. Delicate, yet robust. This fragrance dances upon your skin, morphing with each movement, in and out between floral, spiciness, sweetness, and woodiness.<br />
This was love at first sniff for me, and has quickly become a signature in my collection.<br />
The longevity is more than one could ask for with 8-12 hours depending on the conditions.<br />
The sillage is magnificient. It will not drown out a room with a few sprays, but it will leave a pleasant trail as you walk by with about 2 feet of projection.<br />
<br />
Haltane transports me to a village in the English countryside. A small town lined with cottages. It is around the holidays, the air is crisp yet refreshing. You can see the village baker hard at work through the window of his cobblestone bakery, making an assortment of sweet goodies, most notably his famous pralines. As you continue walking further into town along the cobblestone streets, you smell an assortment of woods being split by the townsfolk to prepare their fireplaces for the winter that lies ahead. You happen upon an essential oils boutique a stone's throw from the bakery, the aromas waft out of the open front door. Citrus, lavender, sage, and exotic woods, beckon you to come in and indulge your senses... You are filled with joy in this very moment as you pause and take in a deep breath. Life is good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2168502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2168502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167293" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joshua Zijdeman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1475576"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1475576.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joshua Zijdeman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1475576">Joshua Zijdeman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 04:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wearing this makes you feel like your a member of the royal familly. The scent is so elegant i have no words and the quality is there. Easy to wear and just perfect but the opening is bit better then the drydown in my opinion. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2167293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2167293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is amazing though and it dries down to a woody base with some clean oud and even though you smell it the entire time, it is never overbearing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timsmellsg00d"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="timsmellsg00d" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-30352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood"title="Oud Satin Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196">timsmellsg00d</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 17:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean sweet oud. This is Oud For Greatness but sweeter and without the food pantry effect. I initially did not like this but it grew on me, it is clean and has a candied kind of sweetness mixed with oud which is a note I didn't like when I first got into fragrances. This is an amazing signature and even though the oud is most likely synthetic I still like this fragrance.<br />
Scent: 8.5/10<br />
Performance: 9/10<br />
Price: 6/10<br />
Overall: 7.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2160455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2160455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160394" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JB11128"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2063261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JB11128" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/AXE/Black-29883.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29883.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black"title="Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2063261">JB11128</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud for greatness took R540 and added Oud, Haltane took OFG and added praline<br />
This smells very close to OFG but I prefer this because of the praline note. The Oud comes off woodier instead of aromatic, this is an easy to like Oud. The praline gives a great sweetness to the fragrance and I love it. All around performance is amazing so if you have the money to get it I would 100% recommend it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2160394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2160394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2157253" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cabooter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2089916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cabooter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-1801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur"title="Musc Ravageur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2157253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2157253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916">Cabooter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 16:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first it was nice, a bit like the inside of an antique wooden cabinet. But as it dries down it becomes more and more sweet. Disgustingly sweet. In combination with the oud it was revolting. This was the first sample I was desperate to scrub off. Why does every PDM fragrance have to be so sweet? It almost feels childish.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2157253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2157253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156368" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="player1363"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1480218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="player1363" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480218">player1363</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 01:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@eren.ceylan<br />
- Oud for Greatness is not an original fragrance, it is an interpretation of Baccarat Rouge. They added "oud" and some spices and tried to market it to men. It still has the same saffron sweetness and the burnt candy vibes, so.<br />
<br />
PDM and INITIO are sister companies, the same people own them, and most of their fragrances smell alike.<br />
<br />
This is a CEDARWOOD bomb though. You get so much cedar in this, that it could be a cedar fragrance, so I find Haltane very close to Oud Wood too<br />
<br />
The scent itself I think is a better and usable version of OFG. A bit less oudy, a lot woodier, and a bit sweeter.<br />
The performance is beastly. <br />
%40 more juice compared to OFG. (90 ml vs 125 ml)<br />
Good choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2156368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2156368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150174" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eren.ceylan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eren.ceylan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003719">eren.ceylan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 22:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Likewise Aventus stream, OFG also did their own throne with that oud and saffron blend. <br />
Haltane is another member of OFG stream but the performance is not as much OFG as for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2150174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2150174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143314" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lukasssss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lukasssss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553">Lukasssss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The oud and saffron combo is tha bomb. Smells very luxurious. I also smell something leathery that blends in very well with the other notes. This is spicier and sweeter than TF Oud Wood, which I like - and I actually prefer Haltane. The cedarwood is quite prominent which makes this fragrance warm and less sterile. Might actually be my favorite oud-centered fragrance yet. 8,5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2143314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2143314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2134842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134842" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FrankaSCENTSments"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FrankaSCENTSments" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Caspian-Cherry-97641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caspian Cherry"title="Caspian Cherry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581934">FrankaSCENTSments</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-24">04/24/24 07:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haltane to me is a hyper masculine, power move type of fragrance. This is my go-to any time I'm leading a work meeting or presenting in front of a group of colleagues.  The saffron, oud, and lavender play so well together here. It's crisp, it's elegant, and it really commands the attention. This is an oud that projects and lasts for hours but isn't choking you (or those around you) to death. It also garners a ton of compliments! It's really an elevated masculine fragrance that works all year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2134842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2134842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133643" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 07:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I sampled every PDM fragrance at a niche shop, I remembered thinking Haltane was my favourite one I sampled. <br />
I was on a 4-month waitlist for this to come back in stock, when it was available the first time, I couldn't stomach the $300 on discounter sites for it.<br />
then I got my bonus, sold a few things, and 2 weeks later it came back in stock again so I bought it.<br />
<br />
Was it worth the wait and the price tag?<br />
<br />
Well, for starters, it's the perfect strength for me: What I mean is it projects very well without being cloying, you are hit with that lavender and clary sage that immediately gets overtaken by oud. Oud for me has always been tricky, a note I can never blind-buy, but the oud here is incredibly pleasing and smooth, &amp; compliments the subtle freshness the lavender and clary sage brings.<br />
<br />
The praline note is tricky here but works well, it's almost like this fragrance very quietly wants to smell edible but if you try thinking that way, the oud comes back to remind you that you have something really special here.<br />
I still do not recommend blind-buying it, what I consider an easy-wear, easy-to-love might not be the same thing for you. <br />
<br />
There is absolutely a resemblance to its Initio relative without as heavy of an oud.<br />
<br />
To conclude, yes, this is worth the price, $300CAD for 125ml isn't too bad, plus the longevity of this tells me I will have this fragrance for years to come.<br />
<br />
9.2/10 lovely oud &amp; lavender combo, another hit from Parfums De Marly.<br />
<br />
Edit: Well, I really need someone to tell me. Does this scent last long to you? Do I just go noseblind to it quickly? I do 4 sprays and cannot smell it after an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2133643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2133643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nope nope nope.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2132134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2132134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131470" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jigginssean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1034490.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jigginssean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490">jigginssean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 08:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eh, I can tell its a well made blend but it really ain't my style. As a lover of appealing scents that others around you also enjoy, I can imagine this one upsetting quite a few but also I'm sure some will love it. A bit too daring for my tastes but if you can pull it off, power to you! There also seems to be a dirty note in here somewhere that puts my nose off quite a bit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2131470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2131470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131436" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PauliBoine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1857085.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PauliBoine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857085">PauliBoine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine you're standing in front of a huge castle surrounded by pine trees. The sky is dark and a thunderstorm is coming soon. You're wearing a British plaid suit and have two rottweilers on a leash. This light sweetness is also interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2131436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2131436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131203" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrSerious96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrSerious96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471068">MrSerious96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haltane is a beautiful woody, resinous aromatic fragrance that I love and cherish.<br />
<br />
Haltane tweaks the Oud for Greatness DNA to make it distinct enough to not make it a clone and emphasises different aspects of the DNA. Haltane has a clean and smooth woody resinous oud note that epitomises what oud should smell like, no barnyard fecal smell and no unpleasant pungent animalics, just a dry, bright, clean resinous sweetness that is substantive and light even fresh at the same time. The dry, sweet and resinous woods are then complemented by a herbaceous clary sage note that tones down the sweetness and make a fragrance more mature and sophisticated and less youthful. There also is some citrus - bergamot is the opening that fades away quickly. There also seem to be some cashmeran in the background aiding with projection. The saffron isn't too prominent and plays a more supportive role to the composition that is minimalistic, austere, refined yet sweet, modern and engaging.<br />
<br />
The performance is respectable and in keeping with what it's trying to achieve. The longevity is solid 8+ hours with moderete projection for the first few hours.<br />
<br />
Haltane suits an older demographic of successful men of class, wisdom and refinement, ''Old money'' if you will.<br />
<br />
It's a signature scent that can be worn all year round even in the heat of summer which might surprise people who associate oud with heavy oriental amber fragrances. I wore it last year to a friends wedding in the dead of summer in Podgorica - Montenegro and it wasn't cloying at all and fitted the occasion perfectly.<br />
<br />
All and all I think it is an amazing fragrance that is worth the money considering that they used real oud and the overall quality of the ingredients and artisanship from the perfumer, but I admit it is top end with the price and it probably should be closer to 250 for 125ml. This one along with Armani's Oud Royal are my go-to Oud fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2131203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2131203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130988" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bwhupp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2059006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bwhupp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Papilefiko-74667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Papilefiko"title="Papilefiko"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130988ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130988" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059006">bwhupp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 18:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was asked to sample between Nishane Papilefiko and PDM Haltane.... as they are being compared as similar. I do not feel that they are, as you will read under my review of Papilefiko. Papilefiko is straight dusty, dry woods to my nose. It is library of leather bound old books and an old man pouring over those like Merlin the Wizard seeking answers to magics unknown. Now onto Haltane...<br />
<br />
First spray I get a sweeter hit than I did with Papilefiko. Same as Papilefiko, somehow my skin did not get any of the citrus and went straight to the woods. It is a strong oud, but not overly skanky. It is a spongey, decaying wood that is dry and easy to catch a spark. It is that old inners of a tree trunk rotting in a forest that you can crumble in your hands with that punky type wood that makes excellent tinder. But it isn't rotten, because that praline dessert is sitting right there bringing hope and sweetness. It saves it from being punky and off putting with that faint kiss of sweetness. This kiss is giving it a mass appealing and more socially acceptable to the general person who is not a fraghead.<br />
<br />
This is an evil female villian who is a temptress... We know she is bad, but she is beautiful... We are allured to her.. charmed and have to hear what she has to say. She is strong and captivating with that little sweetness of charm. We want to be near and take in everything. Mysterious and captivating, but she's bad.... we just can't help ourselves.<br />
<br />
That is Haltane.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2130988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2130988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130675" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cinamonywhiskey123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cinamonywhiskey123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Virgin-Island-Water-899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Virgin Island Water"title="Virgin Island Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974405">cinamonywhiskey123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 12:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it is sugary clean oud scent with freshness that allows you to wear it at summer if you sprey less than you do</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2130675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2130675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130021" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130021" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yhamthebomb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2056343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2056343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yhamthebomb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Orto-Parisi/Megamare-53471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Megamare"title="Megamare"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130021ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130021" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2056343">yhamthebomb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 19:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a pine tree on Christmas Day. Absolutely gorgeous smell. Great longevity and projection. It's very mass appealing in my opinion, most people LOVE it - or just like it, but no body hates it. The closest thing I've smelt to this is Penhaligon's Halfeti Leather, but Haltane is ultimately better. <br />
<br />
Overall a gorgeous fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2130021"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2130021#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
