align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2129179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2129179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127616" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127616" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yonik_Va"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028381"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yonik_Va" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127616ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127616" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028381">Yonik_Va</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 12:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it, and so does my Dad</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2127616"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2127616#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127614" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127614ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127614" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its very clear from the get go that Haltane is a copy of Oud for Greatness with minor tweaks, which isnt surprising given that the two houses are sister companies. I find this has a slightly fresher opening with the sage and bergamot, but ultimately dries down to the same thing.<br />
<br />
Its got the easily-identifiable saffron and oud combo, where the saffron is overly sweet and somewhat screechy whilst the oud is a fairly basic bitter synthetic oud accord. Theres a hint of sweetness from the praline but overall I find this is the woodier counterpart to Oud for Greatness rather than being a straight saffron bomb.<br />
<br />
This is a pleasant scent dont get me wrong, it doesnt smell bad at all. But for around 300? Thats a joke. Parfums de Marly have really let themselves go, thats a crazy amount of money to pay for such a mediocre scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2127614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2127614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126761" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126761" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfect Shot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304485"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfect Shot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126761ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126761" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304485">Perfect Shot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very strong.<br />
I feel no lavender or bergamot in the opening. It opens similar to Oud for Greatness, dark, rich, with lots of Oud. In fact the praline and saffron cant be smelled until the drydown, where the cedar is more prominent and where the DNA goes apart from OfG. I prefer OfG as it is sweeter and more mass appealing IMO, even its clones such as Oud for Glory. <br />
This one is for serious occasions, for cold weather.<br />
<br />
I wouldnt buy this nor its clones. I dont get it where reviewers say this is a more wearable OfG, and i much rather have OfG</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2126761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2126761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124492" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Basta Perfume"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1925232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1925232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Basta Perfume" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Man-Eau-Fraiche-644.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.644.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Man Eau Fraiche"title="Versace Man Eau Fraiche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1925232">Basta Perfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells so strong bro I did like 8 sprays and its going into my mouth, It smells very rich and dark. my sister says it kind of smells like orange?? somehow but I do kinda see it abit. Dont blind buy this if u are not used to Oud or strong dark fragrances.<br />
Scent 9/10 (for me personally I like this stuff wouldn't wear it everyday tho..)<br />
Longevity 9/10 (8-10 hours)<br />
Projection 9/10 (it gives me about 4-5 hours of projection but it gets weaker at its 4th hour time to time)<br />
Price 5/10 (me i personally bought this for my first PDM but u can just go for a dupe like oud for greatness or oud for glory by lattafa. but original always beats the clones.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2124492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2124492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123830" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unlike Greenley, Haltane is a beastly scent with a very strong, pungent smell in the opening that tames as it goes towards dry down. Its not the most mass appealing scent DNA, but it is a great oud scent with fresh, citrusy, aromatic, gourmand, woody nuances. And a very masculine scent profile, I tested this alongside my husband and I personally would not wear Haltane. My husband doesnt like it either..<br />
<br />
It might be worth the hype it gets because of its phenomenal longevity and enormous sillage, but this is not an easy reach type of scent for most people. If youre loving oud scents, you might find Haltane absolutely amazing and worth the hefty price. I am not crazy about oud fragrances. In order to like them, they need to be a very gourmand, sweet oud, vanilla/amber/benzoin based <br />
scents. Otherwise, oud is not my thing  <br />
<br />
For me (and my husband) Haltane its a pass. I am happy to explore scents that are not necessarily my comfort zone and occasionally I find something new and intriguing that I feel like I want to get into my collection but Haltane is not the case.<br />
<br />
Also, personal pet peeve, I cant stand that shade of green. Green is my least favourite colour and this matte medium green is very annoying to my retina</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2123830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2123830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119162" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ToxicMale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ToxicMale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090236">ToxicMale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like any amount of sweetness, you will like Haltane. The fragrance starts (as others have stated) as a lighter/fresher variant of Oud for Greatness; it begins with a nice spicy scent. Unfortunately, the dry down goes sweet and may not be suitable if you prefer a more masculine scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2119162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2119162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118375" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="afternoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815424.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="afternoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Himalaya-465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himalaya"title="Himalaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815424">afternoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really but really wanted to like this.<br />
<br />
At first, the oud in this fragrance hits almost aggressively, nearly choking me. Reminiscent of many boldly masculine scents, yet it boasts a rich blend that's undeniably intriguing. It transports me to the taxis of the Middle East, where the fabric-covered seats have been nearly scorched by the sun and infused with the deep, lingering scent of cigarettesa blend so heavy that it seems to meld with the very essence of the car itself. <br />
<br />
As time passes, it develops a nostalgic and purposeful quality, much like the story I've just described. I can only envision wearing thisor wanting it on someonewith a few conditions: sparing application. It's a scent that would clash with winter's closed windows and indoor heating, and it's certainly not suited for a post-gym environment. To wear this, one must exude cleanliness and purpose, radiating charisma effortlessly. You must be able to carry it off without eliciting disgusted looks and comments. Best reserved for nights in the spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2118375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2118375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2117990" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Keg7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Keg7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2117990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2117990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933862">Keg7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy and woody. As a family member put it to me it smells nostalgic, and I agree it smells like a grandma's house but in an endearing way. Personally, it is my most complimented fragrance, and also my personal favorite fragrance that I own. I would recommend it to any and everyone. It may not be unique since OFG exists, but it sets itself apart from most other fragrances out there. This is my 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2117990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2117990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2117566" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maliken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maliken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2117566ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2117566" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503">Maliken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-07">04/07/24 17:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy Oud for Greatness even though it has very limited wearability and Haltane does freshen it up with a more aromatic touch to where its no longer a winter exclusive scent. Haltane is essentially the same fragrance but replacing the nutmeg and patchouli with clary sage and praline. <br />
<br />
Unfortunately I really do not enjoy the combination of notes in Haltane which come across as an incoherent mess to my nose. The strong, masculine spiciness of Oud for Greatness is what provides a contrast and helps to balance the BR540 style of saffron overdose. Haltane has no spice and instead doubles down on the sweetness with a synthetic praline accord that gets nauseating real quick as it mixes with the other notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2117566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2117566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115540" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Swayze123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2052199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Swayze123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052199">Swayze123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very piney . Kinda elegant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2115540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2115540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113092" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PK_thundr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2060445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PK_thundr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2060445">PK_thundr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a wonderful, wearable oud fragrance. It's not skanky, but it blends so well with the sweet saffron and praline notes in the fragrance. The cedar and the bergamot give it a nice mass appeal to balance out the other unique notes. Everything comes together so well. <br />
It is a very unique smell so you *could* use this as an everday except for summer, but I think that this is best for the night time and best for when you want to be noticed. This would absolutely kill at a dressed event.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2113092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2113092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="viez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1716159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="viez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159">viez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 17:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just tried this again after letting my sample sit on the shelf for a few months and wow, I'm blown away. I didn't realize just how much I love this fragrance until now. <br />
<br />
This could definitely be a cold weather signature. For an oud fragrance it's relatively easy to pull off and you'll smell unique compared to most people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2111211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2111211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111174" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dani.G.German"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1795060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dani.G.German" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795060">Dani.G.German</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 17:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't find this very sweet, more of a spicy woody fragrance. Reminds me heavily of an adult version of ax body spray kilo from my younger days, and I mean that in the least denigrating way possible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Manly, somewhere between classy and primal. Heavy and serious but sweet and playful... Sexy.<br />
Not for boys.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2108589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2108589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107066" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prunel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prunel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Opus-XII-Rose-Incense-74282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opus XII  Rose Incense"title="Opus XII  Rose Incense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223">Prunel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like sweet oud with saffron. It smells good, but for this kind of price I expect some art. I don't feel like this is art. This is just meant to smell good while being a bit different. The quality is undeniable, I wish it was more unique or daring. If you wanna be different from the average guy while smelling good and classy this is for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2107066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2107066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; End of 2021 batch and it's one of the best things I've ever smelled so far. Between this and OFG though I would still choose OFG for it's monstrous performance but if you can find Haltane for a good price at a discounter then definitely get it. Stillage (scents are weak on me) 3.5/10<br />
Scent 7.5/10<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2089070" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BokeeLee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221604"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1221604.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BokeeLee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2089070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2089070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221604">BokeeLee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Interesting parfume. Better version of OFG if u ask me... Not so linear and boring like Initio. I had older package and now i got new one... Im not sure they r same 100%. I dont get anymore that hint of citrus in opening... Pralines r not so prominent anymore... All about lavender and oud... Still works great (8+ hours) and i will keep him in collection.<br />
<br />
Scent 8/10<br />
Performances 8/10<br />
Price 7/10<br />
Overall 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2089070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2089070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
However, when I tried my friends bottle for a full day  I was surprised by the differences. This is sweeter, denser, and overall much better than OFG. <br />
<br />
I usually stay away from saffron in fragrances because I go noseblind but with Haltane I smell it all throughout its 12+ hour lifespan. <br />
<br />
Girlfriend loves it, says I smell like a Middle Eastern Prince. <br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2076357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2076357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RifleZz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992810"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1992810.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RifleZz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992810">RifleZz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 02:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first tried this, I laughed. <br />
To me and my parents it smelled like an old woman and there was something odd about it.<br />
I left the sample alone for a few months and then I came back to it. I don't know if my nose matured or if the fragrance mancerated but it smells so much diffrent now.<br />
I get the oud which is dark, I get a tad bit of sweetnes from the praline and some freshness.<br />
This to me now smells like a mature wealthy man.<br />
This was a 5 / 10 when i first tried it, but now it is one of my fav fragrances from PDM - so its now a 10 / 10. I don't have to mention the well above avrage performances with good projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2066871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2066871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens with fresh herbaceous notes of lavender and sage but also sweet with a lactonic praline note and a leather leaning saffron. It also has an old woody smell of oud mixed with cedawood . It smells like an old wooden chest that for like 50 years, was storing a piece of clothing that was sprayed with TF Tuscan leather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064626" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MattL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617775.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MattL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); Now I wonder why it took me so long to buy it. Its fresh, masculine, mature, it lasts all day, and you can pretty much wear it in any weather. Its one of those scents that smells amazing on your skin and radiates beautifully to those around you. You cant go wrong with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2064626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2064626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057689" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BLACKZEORANGER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2004633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BLACKZEORANGER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2004633">BLACKZEORANGER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 19:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If youre looking for a mass appealing and safe oud fragrance this is it. It smells so good. People will absolutely ask about the fragrance. Yes its pricey but its worth it. Its not redundant to have OFG and Haltane. OFG is dark while Haltane is very uplifting. If you dont have the money, just save up and grab it. You wont regret it. Even if YOU dont love the scent, the people around you will be drawn to you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2057689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2057689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056550" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Odor Aeternitatis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1816990.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Odor Aeternitatis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990">Odor Aeternitatis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I compared Elevated Oud by Zara with Haltane, side by side on a scent blotter and skin. Initially, Zara's top note smells cheaper and more synthetic, but after 30 minutes, it becomes almost identical to Haltane (above 90% similarity). Although Haltane may seem stronger, it's actually not. Zara's longevity and projection are both stronger than Haltane's.<br />
<br />
The bad news for lovers of this fragrance is that Firminich, the company that produces Zara's Elevated Oud, also makes most of Parfum De Marly fragrances. Unfortunately, the materials used in Haltane and Elevated Oud by Zara are quite similar. There is ZERO natural oud. Talking about originality, Haltane is inspired by Oud for Greatness (which means it has copied the DNA). <br />
<br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2056550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2056550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2054798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2054798" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="taskalizer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/527536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.527536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="taskalizer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2054798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2054798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/527536">taskalizer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-07">02/07/24 07:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A greener Kalan, a lighter Oud for Greatness, a richer Ganymede.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2054798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2054798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2054503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
https://parfums-de-marly.com/products/haltane</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2043760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2043760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037784" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gastro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1739533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gastro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Fiero-11802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiero"title="Fiero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037784ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037784" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739533">Gastro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, based on my love for Layton, I decided to get a decant of Haltane. I'm wondering if anyone can relate to my first experience with this fragrance. I got a faint whiff of hard boiled eggs or farts! <br />
(And no, it wasn't me! )<br />
Has anyone else noticed this?!?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2037784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2037784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dfreeman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dfreeman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820254">dfreeman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 18:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first, I was mildly repulsed and uninterested in this fragrance. Given time, however, my appreciation has grown tremendously for it. It's a very woody fragrance that is a bit musky and feels a bit 'mossy.' The praline is fairly prominent, along with the bergamot. Smelling this makes you feel as if you are entranced in a dark yet mystical forest. I find the oud really alluring in this scent as I keep finding myself going back to smell it. Among normative fragrances you smell daily, this is a niche special that gives a fresh taste to your palate. I could never find myself purchasing a full bottle of this as it is incredibly expensive, and I feel it could only be pulled off by a certain type of person. Nonetheless, I still find great appreciation within Haltane.<br />
<br />
9/10 (10 if it were more fitting for myself)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2036072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2036072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
