padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rmnnnnn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804742"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1804742.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rmnnnnn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804742">rmnnnnn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 00:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm currently in the market for a great and likable oud fragrance and as you might know, it's pretty challenging. So, I was exploring: Oud for Greatness, Ex Nihilo Outcast Blue Extrait, Ombre Nomade and Noveau Monde. Haltane is definitely the most likeable and mass-pleasing from them all, best safe bet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2033321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2033321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="orangelips11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407366.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="orangelips11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-de-Noir-1822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir de Noir"title="Noir de Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407366">orangelips11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-15">01/15/24 22:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The praline note stand out in this fragrance, every time when I am wearing it, I wanna eat myself, LOL<br />
PDM market it as a men fragrance, but I think it is very unisex<br />
<br />
Definitely the same family with Oud For Greatness, but OFG don't have the praline note,<br />
projection in this fragrance is moderate, I hope it project more, longevity is around 6 hrs, very well crafted fragrance<br />
<br />
P.S Haltane is leaning more gourmand side, OFG is more saffron, leathery and more mature<br />
<br />
Haltane is 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2032128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2032128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029130" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cletus Lorentz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cletus Lorentz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rogue-Perfumery/Mousse-Illuminee-53821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mousse Illuminee"title="Mousse Illuminee"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453442">Cletus Lorentz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 15:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, this is so incredible synthetic and obnoxious sweet amberwood. One of the worst perfumes I have ever smelled. It plays in the same ballpark as the infamously bad "oud for greatness". I just cannot believe anyone for real thinks this smells good. I guess there is a ton of payed shills hyping this, and a ton of ppl with no taste whatsoever think they like this just because a ton of payed influencers want you to spend your money on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2029130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2029130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027897" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wldnml"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1873457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="wldnml" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1873457">wldnml</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Awesome! Special. This is the fragrance that I regret not using when I put something else on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2027897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2027897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027781" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ZeaMoore4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761519"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761519.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ZeaMoore4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Imaginary-Authors/A-City-On-Fire-29211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A City On Fire"title="A City On Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761519">ZeaMoore4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 10:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fantastic beginner Oud fragrance. Starts of fresh, then quickly and smoothly deepens into a slightly sweet scent with the Praline note showing up. It then turns into a woody scent with a gentle Oud and Safran taking center stage after about 45 minutes. <br />
<br />
It's not noted, but there's most likely Vetiver in it.<br />
<br />
Long lasting. About 8-10 hours on my skin with good projection through out the active lifetime. It gets another 10 hours as an inactive skin scent. <br />
<br />
One of my favorites, and an underestimated PDM fragrance. A future classic for sure.<br />
<br />
A small similarity to Oud For Greatness. OFG starts of more spicy while Haltane starts of fresh. OFG ends up as a spicy Oud, while Haltane ends up more sweet Oud. As similar as a lemon to an Orange I'd say. <br />
<br />
Not blind buy safe, but as safe as Oud fragrances come.<br />
<br />
9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2027781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2027781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025190" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="player1363"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1480218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="player1363" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480218">player1363</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 03:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get the Oud for Greatness reviews, but they don't smell the same. These two have saffron sweetness in common.<br />
Haltane is very woody and masculine. I get a lot of cedar, so this could be a cedar fragrance<br />
To me, it smells more like Oud Wood by Tom Ford. More in the air.<br />
So my final decision: Something between Oud for Greatness and Oud Wood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2025190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2025190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022810" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hugoisl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594111.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hugoisl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Flame-52180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Flame"title="Eros Flame"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594111">hugoisl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 15:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance by PDM as usual. Well blended wood with sweetness and some spicy and fresh accords. Personally, I dont get that much praline like others may. I get a rather strong cedar note, which I really like because I love woody scents. Would defined recommend this if you enjoy oud fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2022810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2022810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like a rich library.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2019370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2019370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019256" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lidor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lidor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Le-Parfum-74915.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74915.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"title="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960">lidor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 15:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>haltane is oud for greatness, but instead of musk with  oud , you have sweet and Saffron with oud.<br />
This perfume is one of the best and most special I've smelled. wow<br />
<br />
Scent:10<br />
Projection/Longevity:8.5<br />
Uniqueness:9.5<br />
quality:10<br />
Value for money:ok<br />
<br />
Overall:9.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2019256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2019256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943980">AlexKouss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>my favorite pdm by far I liked it so much that I tested it on skin and after I left the store I went in again after 40 minutes just to buy it worth every penny</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2011983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2011983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010345" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Doyourtaxes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1677696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Doyourtaxes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Sweetie-Aoud-31493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweetie Aoud"title="Sweetie Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677696">Doyourtaxes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent:10<br />
Projection:7<br />
Longevity:9<br />
Overall:9</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2010345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2010345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DarthFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1639884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DarthFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Superleggera-95753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"title="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639884">DarthFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The saffron is the only similarity I get to OFG. I have full bottles and even backups of both Haltane and OFG because they're 2 of my favorite fragrances. I've worn them both many times and I've always been surprised at the claims that they are nearly identical, some people even calling Haltane a clone of OFG. The scent profiles are very similar, both woody, spicy, sweet, oriental fragrances. However, they both have unique qualities that totally differentiate themselves from one another. Like in a blind smell test for example, I'd never confuse the 2 and guess the correct one 100 out of 100 times with ease. <br />
<br />
Haltane has a much more bright, aromatic top that even has some barbershop elements to it. This aromatic accord lasts about 2 hours, well through the mid and even into the early dry down, it just becomes less pronounced over time but never fully disappears. OFG never has this bright, aromatic, barbershop-like accord at any point. The sweetness is also totally different in both fragrances. In Haltane, I really pick up that praline note and it smells like pralines. OFG is less sweet in general, and the sweetness doesn't smell like pralines at all. The sweetness in OFG smells like it's coming from the saffron and nutmeg which gives off a totally different type of character and vibe. Haltane's saffron is much more leathery and the leather accord is much more prominent in Haltane than it is in OFG. OFG has much more prominent musky and smoky accords compared to Haltane. Haltane also isn't very earthy at all, and OFG has that patchouli that's of the earthy variation. The 2 fragrances also have different dry downs because Haltane has a very prominent and unmistakable cedar which is totally absent in OFG, and even the ouds used in both are of a slightly different variation. Haltane is also obviously a male targeted fragrance with that aromatic barbershop accord whereas OFG is clearly more unisex.<br />
<br />
Great performance is another thing Haltane and OFG both share in common, great longevity and projection. My bottles of OFG are the original 77% formulation which are a bit stronger than Haltane, but Haltane is definitely stronger than the 80% reformulated bottles of OFG they're selling now.<br />
<br />
Edit: I totally forgot to talk about the nutmeg in OFG. Nutmeg is easily one of the top 3 strongest notes in OFG and it's pungent, earthy, even slightly culinary. It's very pronounced and highly discernible, a massive part of OFG. The nutmeg also makes OFG quite a bit more spicy than Haltane.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2010269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2010269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010042" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sajjead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sajjead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275522">Sajjead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 04:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is basically Oud for greatness clone</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2010042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2010042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008499" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Radknight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847693.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Radknight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Obsession-for-Men-249.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.249.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Obsession for Men"title="Obsession for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847693">Radknight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-23">12/23/23 00:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance. I was lucky enough to have a perfumer give me a guided tour of this scent recently, first showing me Oud For Greatness then introducing me to Haltane. Simply put, it's above and beyond OFG and much more complex. I will be buying this very soon. Beautiful fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2008499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2008499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008077" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gary.D"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gary.D" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872751">Gary.D</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this masterpiece has quickly become my favourite from the pdm house, bought it in September and have found I've put a massive dent in the amount of juice left.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2008077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2008077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="myadkov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/540034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.540034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="myadkov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/The-Ghost-In-The-Shell-69412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Ghost In The Shell"title="The Ghost In The Shell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001960" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beanman1._"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beanman1._" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927775">Beanman1._</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanna start out by saying that i didn't originally think that this was super special, smelt super warm in the opening and almost made me choke with how thick it was. <br />
After giving it a few wears this is defiantly by favorite PDM fragrance, right in front of oajan. <br />
I defiantly recommend you get a decant first, not blind buy safe, but a beautifully crafted fragrance. <br />
Be aware on the new batches it doesn't last AS LONG but it's still 6+ hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2001960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2001960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000473" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244519">Sapere_Aude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 20:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i have been rocking this for about a week and i had an epiphany. if this smells as good as it does on me, a man, it would be absolutely next level on a woman. this is a feminine fragrance even though men can wear it. this is for an older Italian woman with a motorcycle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1994560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1994560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993211" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="liquidlase"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1532351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="liquidlase" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532351">liquidlase</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Shameful this has been compared to OFG. My purchase came with samples of OFG and Sedley. Only an oud note is in both and the oud used in both are even different oud varieties/notes. Maybe the price tag is only similarity.<br />
<br />
That out of the way, I love the balance of woods and aromatics in this. High quality materials rings throughout the drydown. I dont know what the top note is but smells like a floral woman's perfume a little but makes it smell gorgeous. However that is backed by extremely masculine green herbal almost vegetal cigar tobacco middle notes that I get that no-one talks about. I think it is the mix of saffron, cedar, and oud with praline in the heart that creates the tobacco accord. This thing reminds me of unsmoked fine spicy cigars quite bluntly and in my face, especially on paper/fabrics. Much like a cuban cigar. This has created a tobacco accord better than most fragrances with tobacco in the name or listed notes. Its like sticking your nose up to a cuban and taking a whiff. I believe that is what has inspired the Havane sounding naming, which is French for cuban cigar.<br />
<br />
Once the top/mid/saffron finally wears down a bit, a very high quality oud takes over as the long lasting eternal scent that can last for days on fabrics. The unnecessary praline note that shouldnt have been added also seems to stick by the oud. This oud makes it worth it to me and is undeniably real oud.<br />
<br />
Its hard to smell right up to your nose directly after spraying as it is overwhelming. The top comes off a salty mess of way too many potent notes if you put your nose right up to it until it dries down and reveals the beauty I bought this for in the first place. Its best on skin for me vs fabric/paper. This projects off my skin well and love smelling the heavenly scent in the sir off my skin earning it a top 5 spot on my shelf.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1993211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1993211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TomasN21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1778265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TomasN21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Lemon-Mint-39181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Lemon Mint"title="Aoud Lemon Mint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778265">TomasN21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my God! I fell instantly inlove with this fragrance.. its the best from the house! It remins me of something but i cant imagine what it is it is god in bottle and thanks to its slightly freshness you can wear it on summer nights.. great versatility</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1992912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1992912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1991246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1991246" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kenta3737"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1849537"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kenta3737" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1991246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1991246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859402">luckily77777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>well I tried this one because it was said to be similar to OFG, with some differences, and I thought it might be more what I'm looking for as a SS than OFG. <br />
first thing I noticed was that it did strike me similarly to OFG, but right away it came with a green herbal smell... this went away quite rapidly as it dried.  then the praline came out, and it began to remind me of Kilian angel share as much as OFG. all in all I like OFG better, because it's simpler and stronger, and better suited to layering, I like haltane better than angel's share, though, because the sweetness is more tolerable and less nauseating to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1981089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1981089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mhthefragrancelover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1628100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1628100.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mhthefragrancelover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1628100">Mhthefragrancelover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-19">11/19/23 20:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is sick man. At the price point I'd say it should last longer, but the longevity is still acceptable as is. It's higher than average. Such a nice smooth wood fragrance. Unmistakably masculine and high quality. Nice, smooth, inoffensive oud. Slightly sweet and laconic from the praline. Personally that's the only thing I don't really like. I feel that it weakened the overall composition. But without the praline for said sweet lactonic twist, it would've came out like another OFG. Still an absolute banger in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1980632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1980632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980415" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ninjandrew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1642457.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="ninjandrew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Bowmakers-22058.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22058.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bowmakers"title="Bowmakers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642457">ninjandrew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-19">11/19/23 14:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy this fragrance right after I spray it - I can pick out all of the middle and base notes, but out of the top notes I can only pick out the faintest hint of bergamot. Otherwise it does still have an aromatic accord, carried mostly by the saffron.<br />
<br />
Not one for gourmands myself, I wasn't sure what I was going to think about the praline note, but it isn't too strong and adds a nice level of sweetness that settles down 20 min. in that works well with the woodiness and oud of this fragrance.<br />
<br />
Edit: Haltane to Oud for Greatness quick comparison - I can definitely see the resemblance, but with haltane being slightly sweeter, a bit more aromatic and a stronger saffron note, whereas oud for greatness has a slightly stronger oud note.<br />
<br />
OfG strength is the patchouli/nutmeg/musk combination (until drydown reveals the musks animalic funk). Haltane strength is the aromatic saffron/oud combination.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1980415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1980415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stadensalex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1893980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1893980.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stadensalex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1893980">stadensalex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very versatile fragrance that I've worn to many different occasions, but may be a bit overbearing and unsuited scent-wise to warmer weather. <br />
<br />
The fairly fresh opening is felt with the bergamot and sage clearly present, but the aroma is quite shallow to my nose still, at this point. The praline and the uniqueness of the saffron step in after about 15 minutes, giving the fragrance a dark, deep type of sweetness, one that has caught the attention of many peers, and immensely intriguing to all. The base notes are super woody, smelling almost like an old, woody attic, in a positive way. The fragrance is quite a deep and dark one, yet still very versatile, but doesn't as a result tend to produce a massive scent bubble around me, according to my experiences. Date nights have however been an absolute hit wearing this, with it being described as absolutely scrumptious in close and cozy situations. Doesn't project very long, though lasts like a powerhouse, especially on clothes. <br />
<br />
Verdict: An excellent, deep sweetness of a scent that is well-accustomed to the man on that one evening he'll be extra- close. An evening restaurant-date or a poker-night with friends are situations of such. However, wearing it as an everyday scent is absolutely viable, just might be a tad dark for the average guy looking for an attention-grabbing freshie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1978269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1978269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978205" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Opening is gorgeous though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1978205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1978205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; With Haltane, I had 0 headache.<br />
<br />
Sprayed it on a paper and I was able to smell it two day after. <br />
<br />
Very long lasting, and tbh I think it is mass appealing. <br />
opening is fruity and spicy. mid and base are woody with a tiny bit of sweetness</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1975530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1975530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
