padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1967423" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Guardian2471"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816064"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1816064.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Guardian2471" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1967423ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1967423" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816064">Guardian2471</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-03">11/03/23 00:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slightly chocolatey Oud with good performance. The scent is an 8/10 and this is a fragrance that I would recommend checking out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1967423"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1967423#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1967361" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coldcoffee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1118541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coldcoffee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1967361ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1967361" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1118541">Coldcoffee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 22:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's similar to OFG, slightly more tolerable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1967361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1967361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1965945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1965945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Christian Cantelli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826417"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826417.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Christian Cantelli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-Black-Iris-60929.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60929.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude Black Iris"title="Interlude Black Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1965945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1965945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826417">Christian Cantelli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 09:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haltane opens with a very volatile citrusy cloud that lasts the time of a breath, without even giving you time to decide whether you like it or not; shortly afterwards, a somewhat metallic and medicinal saffron comes overbearingly to the fore, which caused me anosmia almost instantly, preventing me from smelling anything for more than half an hour: unfortunately, that is a note with which I often have this problem and in this perfume it is very present indeed. I could barely smell the scent and yet I was showered with compliments, I was in a clothes store and the saleswoman wanted me to write the brand and name of the perfume on a card (she didn't ask for my phone number though...); when my sense of smell returned I found spices, something sweet and a strong woody aroma given by the Oud, like old furniture on display in an antique shop, accompanied by the smell of dusty fabrics, which leads me to suppose that it contains Cashmeran, even though it is not declared. Analysing the sweet part, I then recognised the praline, composed of milk chocolate and caramel, with a fruity pear-like nuance. As time passed, the transition brought out herbaceous and green hints of patchouli, which ties in nicely with the Oud, as well as a particular type of sweet Vetiver that I know very well and which is reminiscent of dry, golden hay. Haltane is a rather dry, powdery, sweet, woody and spicy fragrance. The ingredients are beautifully blended and if it weren't for that damn Saffron I might have enjoyed it much more. Is it a good perfume? Sure. Do I like it? No. But those around me like it, the duration is remarkable, the sillage very evident as well, even if I perceive it little. A fragrance to wear for others, rather than for oneself, at least in my case.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1965945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1965945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963188" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1963188" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gamecocks1!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gamecocks1!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-11784.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11784.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend"title="Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963188ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963188" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087">Gamecocks1!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-28">10/28/23 18:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bigwarf l get good longevity out of haltane no problems on my skin. Yes people compare these 2 and they are different. I don't understand</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1963188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1963188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1962234" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BIGDWARF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789480"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1789480.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BIGDWARF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1962234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1962234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789480">BIGDWARF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-27">10/27/23 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with the comment under me, they are pretty different in the drydown, where I find Haltane is much more complex and masculine. Longevity is were Haltane loses out bigly, this one only last about 3-4 hour on me and then its all gone. And its one of the earlier batches as well, like when it came out for the public. <br />
<br />
Haltane scentwise, OFG for performance. Both are imo top notch fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1962234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1962234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1962012" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gamecocks1!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gamecocks1!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-11784.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11784.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend"title="Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1962012ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1962012" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087">Gamecocks1!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-27">10/27/23 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this one right here. I have been sampling and I got a bottle on the way. I have been testing it beside my oud for Greatness which I love. People compare these 2 but they are different. I can tell they are from the same house but I can tell them apart. Some people say haltane smells like sauvage exlir no it does not. I don't try to act like I'm a perfumer but I know what I smell. I love how pdm,initio uses raw materials love that natural scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1962012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1962012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="70776" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2282972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zongo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zongo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457">Zongo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gather 'round, you vapid vapor-snorting vermin! Ever wonder what it smells like when French aristocracy decides to get down and dirty with Middle Eastern royalty? Well, strap in and prepare your nostrils for Parfums de Marly's Haltane, a scent that'll make you feel like you're snorting crushed diamonds off a Persian prince's dagger.<br />
<br />
This isn't some run-of-the-mill juice for cubicle-dwelling drones and weekend warriors. No, this is olfactory sorcery, a fragrance that comes at you like a powdered-wig wearing nobleman on a three-day absinthe bender. It kicks off with a blast of herbal freshness that'll clear your sinuses faster than a line of gunpowder at a revolutionary's tea party.<br />
<br />
But don't get too comfortable, you mall-scent marinated simpletons. Because just when you think you've got this scent pegged, it pulls a Jekyll and Hyde routine that'd make Robert Louis Stevenson reach for his smelling salts. That initial burst of civility? It's just a smokescreen, a bit of perfumed legerdemain to lull you into a false sense of security.<br />
<br />
As it settles, Haltane transforms like a werewolf under a full moon, morphing into a leathery, woody concoction that'll have you questioning your sanity and your place in the food chain. It's the kind of scent that makes you wonder if those 18th-century French perfumers weren't cooking up more than just fragrances in their gilded laboratories.<br />
<br />
Now, I know what you're thinking, you whippersnappers with your "Oud for Greatness" and your synthetic space-age potions. But let me tell you something - Haltane is to Oud for Greatness what a vintage Chateau Lafite is to bathtub gin. It's got all the gravitas without the headache, all the punch without the synthetic hangover. It's like comparing a symphony orchestra to a kazoo band on meth.<br />
<br />
The longevity? It'll outlast your last three relationships combined. The sillage? It leaves a trail so intoxicating, you'll have people following you like you're the Pied Piper of Hamelin, if the Pied Piper smelled like a million bucks and a long night in a Moroccan spice market.<br />
<br />
Is it for everyone? Hell no. This is a scent for the bold, the brave, the slightly unhinged. It's for men who aren't afraid to smell like they've been arm-wrestling with history in the perfumed halls of Versailles.<br />
<br />
So go ahead, take the plunge. Douse yourself in this elixir and prepare for an aromatic journey that'll have you seeing sounds and tasting colors. Because in this bland world of cookie-cutter colognes and play-it-safe scents, Haltane stands tall as a beacon of olfactory rebellion.<br />
<br />
Haltane isn't just a fragrance, it's a time machine in a bottle, a portal to a world where decadence wasn't just encouraged, it was mandatory. And in this cruel circus of mediocrity we call modern life, it's the aromatic equivalent of a full-contact exorcism for your nostrils.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2282972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2282972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1454874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1454874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rbalkris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1068449.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rbalkris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Strangelove-NYC/A-Fire-Within-99361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Fire Within"title="A Fire Within"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1454874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1454874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068449">rbalkris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-30">11/30/21 05:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pleasant but highly cliched sweet woody aromatic scent. The scent opens with a lovely lavender and clary sage with slight bergamot. The heart is a sweet aromatic mix of saffron and pralines. The perfume settles on a woody base of cedar, elder and slight Hindi Oud. The slight masculine leaning perfume has moderate to strong sillage and very good longevity. The scent is clearly modeled after many similar successes in the same territory most notably the Initio but it does pack a punch. It is happy, beautiful and even a bit classy. Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1454874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1454874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1959024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1959024" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Phalpin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414991.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Phalpin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/French-Avenue/Spectre-Ghost-94697.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94697.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spectre Ghost"title="Spectre Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1959024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1959024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414991">Phalpin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 11:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a clean woody masculine leaning scent that gets compliments. It smells similar to OFG, but it is cleaner and more relaxed. The praline note really balances and supports the spices and woods that are in the forefront. I was considering OFG for a long time, but the more I wore it the more obnoxious it smelled to me. This fragrance doesn't try as hard and is more wearable in my opinion. This smells refined, masculine, and mature without smelling old fashioned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1959024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1959024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1741319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1741319" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1741319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1741319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-23">01/23/23 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Greed as inspiration.<br />
<br />
The Sprecher Group, owner of Initio Parfums Privs, decided to double the sales of its most successful fragrance, Oud For Greatness, by simply cloning it for good measure they did a couple of inconsequential tweaks, changed the name, changed the bottle, and started selling it on their other brand, Parfums de Marly<br />
<br />
I know that the same can be said for most flankers but at least flankers are honest about what theyre trying to do, which is sell almost the same product again and again, whilst here, theyre trying to hide the fact by changing everything but the scent.<br />
<br />
And yes, Haltane is a great perfume, of course it is but thats not the real question the real question is, are both Oud For Greatness and Haltane different enough to merit having the two? And the answer is sadly NO!!<br />
<br />
And I say sadly, because the differences between the two couldve been more noticeable (and more lasting), that simple situation would have rendered both iterations needed on their own rights, regrettably, the Sprecher Group took the easiest and safest route by just copying the recipe, adding a few inconsequential tweaks, and selling it under a new name and company, as if they never knew of the half brothers existence.<br />
<br />
By the way, the inconsequential tweaks in Haltane (in comparison with OFG) are slightly diminished sweetness, ever so slightly stronger leather, and a herbal undertone.<br />
<br />
The opening is where such variations will be more noticeable, mainly the fresh herbal aura, which is truly very likable, unfortunately, it will be completely lost in just a couple of hours, hence the inconsequential part.<br />
<br />
After those few hours, absolutely no one will be able to tell the difference between Oud for Greatness and Haltane, making the latter an unnecessary addition to any perfume wardrobe.<br />
<br />
Now, speaking solely about Haltane it is foremost a soft Agarwood fragrance, with a slightly sweet Praline accord, lovely aromatics from the Lavender and Clary Sage, a clean leathery bottom and a creamy aura.<br />
<br />
I also smell some delicious sweet musk in the juice, however, the note breakdown doesnt mention having any even so, I do believe the stuff is there.<br />
<br />
It is a completely unisex parfum, any women who chooses to wear this perfume will smell amazing. Preferably a cold or mild weather fragrance, and better suited for a special occasion.<br />
<br />
Finally, we get to performance which incidentally is also the biggest difference with its cloned half brother projection in Haltane is on the lower side of moderate for two hours and then it becomes intimate, with longevity of about 6 hours putting things into perspective, this is just about half of OFGs performance.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, if the differences are truly inconsequential and the performance is not that great, then why would we want to buy Haltane???<br />
<br />
Maybe someone from the Sprecher Groups financial team might be better prepared to explain the reasons</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1741319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1741319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1469853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1469853" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="paradise112"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356436"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1356436.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="paradise112" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Yasep-53562.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53562.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yasep"title="Yasep"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1469853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1469853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356436">paradise112</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-24">12/24/21 22:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>PDMs description sums up Haltane perfectly soft and rich accords of saffron and praline represent an ultra-modern spin on the theme of oud wood. This performs very well on my skin; even better than Habdan or Layton Exclusif. To my nose the opening to the mid is not a smooth transition, however, after wearing a couple times  that is actually welcomed. You then know whats to come, and thats magic through the mid into the dry down. For some of us we fall in love with a particular fragrance house. Those people are not overly concerned with similarities from other brands; theyre nothing more than a reference. What PDM does very well is listen to their fans. They use that feedback to create beautiful fragrances. I think that should be praised. This scent profile was missing from their lineup. The wait is now over. For all of these reasons Haltane deserves a higher score.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1469853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1469853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="70776" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1617136" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1617136" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="royalmagic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357224"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357224.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="royalmagic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1617136ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1617136" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357224">royalmagic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-04">08/04/22 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Guys, listen me now. I bought this fragrance after this massive hype from thouse "influencers" who called this fragrance to be next superstar. This fragrance is bang average, I dont think this fragrance will ever get you compliments or make you stand out from others. Average linear fragrance, im starting to understand why JF has kept quiet on this while having it on his tabel. Dont go all-in on this fragrance just because demirawling called it to be next to layton. Old formulation Layton is way better than this one. What else... amm stop buying Pdm fragrances<br />
Most of guys who wrote their opinion are thouse free testerbottle receivers from pdm. Free gift free positive feedback. Go buy full bottle and then see how average actual 270 euros can smell like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1617136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1617136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2157253" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cabooter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2089916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cabooter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-1801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur"title="Musc Ravageur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2157253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2157253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916">Cabooter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 16:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first it was nice, a bit like the inside of an antique wooden cabinet. But as it dries down it becomes more and more sweet. Disgustingly sweet. In combination with the oud it was revolting. This was the first sample I was desperate to scrub off. Why does every PDM fragrance have to be so sweet? It almost feels childish.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2157253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2157253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1574173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1574173" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Bois-D-Argent-48396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois D'Argent"title="Bois D'Argent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1574173ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1574173" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-30">05/30/22 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening and heart I get only mentholated rubbery oud and vaseline coated leather with no top notes. Something green buried deep; hardly detectable. This is like Oud for greatness mixed with Oud for happiness for the first hour. <br />
<br />
Drydown is similar BR540 Ethyl Malitol and Ambroxan but with clary sage and a tiny bit of leather.<br />
The clary sage and leather is a bit like Tom Ford Fucking Fabulous.<br />
<br />
Summary<br />
Part 1 = OFG &amp; OFH<br />
Part 2 = BR540 &amp; TF Fabulous<br />
<br />
Not original and not special IMO.<br />
This is a PDM cash grab. <br />
<br />
Rating = 4/10<br />
Performance 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="1574173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=1574173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118375" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="afternoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815424.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="afternoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Himalaya-465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himalaya"title="Himalaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815424">afternoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really but really wanted to like this.<br />
<br />
At first, the oud in this fragrance hits almost aggressively, nearly choking me. Reminiscent of many boldly masculine scents, yet it boasts a rich blend that's undeniably intriguing. It transports me to the taxis of the Middle East, where the fabric-covered seats have been nearly scorched by the sun and infused with the deep, lingering scent of cigarettesa blend so heavy that it seems to meld with the very essence of the car itself. <br />
<br />
As time passes, it develops a nostalgic and purposeful quality, much like the story I've just described. I can only envision wearing thisor wanting it on someonewith a few conditions: sparing application. It's a scent that would clash with winter's closed windows and indoor heating, and it's certainly not suited for a post-gym environment. To wear this, one must exude cleanliness and purpose, radiating charisma effortlessly. You must be able to carry it off without eliciting disgusted looks and comments. Best reserved for nights in the spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2118375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2118375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215605" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tip_TopFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tip_TopFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215605ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215605" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191792">Tip_TopFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haltane is a fantastic scent. However, performance after reformulation is awful. Skin scent within the hour and gone after about 3-4. OFG is way better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70776"comment_id="2215605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html?ccid=2215605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="70776" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.172.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Lancome/Tresor-172.html#cc2371106"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Lancme</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Trsor</span>
        </a>

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Lattafa-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Dior.html" class="en2inter">Dior</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">4.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">5.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Guerlain.html" class="en2inter">Guerlain</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">53.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Azzaro.html" class="en2inter">Azzaro</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">54.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Narciso-Rodriguez.html" class="en2inter">Narciso Rodriguez</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">55.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Frederic-Malle.html" class="en2inter">Frederic Malle</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">56.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montblanc.html" class="en2inter">Montblanc</a>
        </span>
    </div>

    <script>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
